text: Kwasi Okyere Wriedt (born 10 July 1994) is a Ghanaian professional footballer who plays as a forward for German club Holstein Kiel and the Ghana national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League CupIncludes the Lower Saxony Cup and DFB- Pokal Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals FC St. Pauli II 2012–13 Regionalliga Nord 5 0 — — — 5 0 2013–14 31 9 — — — 31 9 2014–15 22 5 — — — 22 5 Total 58 14 0 0 0 0 0 0 58 14 LSK Hansa 2015–16 Regionalliga Nord 34 23 1 2 — — 35 25 VfL Osnabrück 2016–17 3.
